title: At COP27, Plans to Overhaul the IMF and World Bank Gain Traction
description: As global warming delivers cascading weather disasters, leaders at U.N. climate talks say it’s time to radically overhaul the World Bank and International Monetary Fund.
dc:creator: David Gelles and Max Bearak
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: Prime Minister Mia Mottley of Barbados during preparations in the country’s capital, Bridgetown, for Tropical Storm Dorian in 2019.
